deletion_priority.description:
DeletionPriority define Deletion Priority.
Higher value means higher priority. Default is 0.
Example: set 1 for Coordinator which should be deleted first and scale down coordinators by one.

overrides.description: Overrides define Member Overrides (Override values from ServerGroup).

resources.description: Resources holds resource requests & limits. Overrides template provided on the group level.

volumeClaimTemplate.description: VolumeClaimTemplate specifies a template for volume claims. Overrides template provided on the group level.

template.description: Template keeps template which is gonna be applied on the Pod.

checksum.description: Checksum keep the Pod Spec Checksum (with ignored fields).

endpoint.description: Deprecated: Endpoint is not saved into the template

podSpec.description: PodSpec specifies the Pod Spec used for this Member.

podSpecChecksum.description: PodSpecChecksum keep the Pod Spec Checksum (without ignored fields).
